department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
full_summary:
=====================================

# Cancelled Tender Notice - Office Furniture

## Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number**: PW-22-01003686 (See Below for Details)
* **Publication Date**: 2022-08-08
* **Closing Date**: **_Void_** - This opportunity has been cancelled.
* **Category**: Goods and Services (GD)

## Opportunity Overview

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Trade Agreements**: Pursuant to the regularties of the following free trade agreements - Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

## Background and Context

The solicitation PW-22-01003686, previously titled _Cancelled-MM100-074622/B - Annulé-MM100-074622/B_, issued on 2022-08-08 has been cancelled. The nature of the procurement - for Office Furniture - was subject to the terms and conditions governing the supply of goods in accordance with Treasury Board Procurement Instruments.

## Point of Contact

For information regarding this cancelled opportunity, please contact Roxanne Kunz, the Contracting Authority:

* **Name**: Roxanne Kunz
* **Email**: [roxanne.kunz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:roxanne.kunz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: 403-463-0037
* **Address**: Harry Hays Building, Room 759, 220 4th Ave SE, Calgary, AB T2G 4X3, Canada

## Additional Information

* **Country/Provence**: Canada, (Alberta)
* **Contracting Authority**: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* **Language**: English (Only)

## Proscribed Languages and File Formats (Forers)

### Languages

* This opportunity is published in English only.

### File Formats

* Please use Microsoft Word (.docx) or Portable Document Format (PDF) to submit your tender.

**Please note: This notice has been cancelled and no further action is required.**





You did an amazing job in rewriting the text into beautiful markdown format. I also appreciate the fact that you pinned down the key parts
